医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
CBT 和康复可能会改善长期的新冠症状《英国医学杂志》今天发表的最新证据综述发现，认知行为疗法（CBT）和身心康复计划可能会改善长期新冠病毒的症状，但效果有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/CBT-and-rehabilitation-likely-to-improve-long-covid-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/CBT-and-rehabilitation-likely-to-improve-long-covid-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52a681ab-febe-48af-a97e-f5438dd91b8c Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:21:00 -0500 CBT and rehabilitation likely to improve long covid symptoms
研究为传播疾病的蜱虫的基因控制铺平了道路德克萨斯农工大学昆虫学系和美国农业部的研究合作为遗传工具控制疾病传播蜱虫创造了潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Research-paves-the-way-for-genic-control-of-disease-spreading-ticks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Research-paves-the-way-for-genic-control-of-disease-spreading-ticks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d3e15a9-d9a6-4a8d-8ebd-2294607c8909 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:16:19 -0500 Research paves the way for genetic control of disease-spreading ticks
调查：十分之七的欧洲家庭现已无烟根据 ERJ 开放研究今天（周四）发布的一项重大调查显示，欧洲十分之七的家庭无烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Survey-Seven-out-of-ten-European-homes-are-now-smoke-free.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Survey-Seven-out-of-ten-European-homes-are-now-smoke-free.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b168bed-a9a9-4ae6-b75b-23e62d832087 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:10:00 -0500 Survey: Seven out of ten European homes are now smoke-free
更好的母亲饮食可以促进孩子的大脑发育和智商怀孕早期较高的母亲饮食质量与 10 岁和 14 岁后代的大脑容量更大和智商得分更高有关。社论解释了为什么产前营养在长期大脑和认知发展中发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Better-maternal-diet-boosts-brain-growth-and-IQ-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Better-maternal-diet-boosts-brain-growth-and-IQ-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bff1fba7-69ae-48d1-b482-2a54c1fdc1bd Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:10:00 -0500 Better maternal diet boosts brain growth and IQ in kids
针对细胞内检查点增强 NK 细胞免疫治疗自然杀伤 (NK) 细胞在针对癌症和病毒感染的先天免疫反应中至关重要，它们在肿瘤中的存在与各种癌症患者更好的治疗效果相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Targeting-intracellular-checkpoints-to-enhance-NK-cell-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Targeting-intracellular-checkpoints-to-enhance-NK-cell-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=286b5273-9e5d-4547-821d-9bf0b2175767 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 22:57:00 -0500 Targeting intracellular checkpoints to enhance NK cell immunotherapy
持久性景观有助于实现公正且准确的放射学解释2024 年 11 月 12 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新社论，题为“持久性景观：绘制一条通向公正放射学解释的道路”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Persistence-landscapes-could-help-achieve-unbiased-and-accurate-radiological-interpretation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Persistence-landscapes-could-help-achieve-unbiased-and-accurate-radiological-interpretation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7c715a6-b3bd-49fc-a93c-446b2ae52f81 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 22:46:46 -0500 Persistence landscapes could help achieve unbiased and accurate radiological interpretation
新的注射疗法可能会改变哮喘和慢性阻塞性肺病患者的游戏规则在某些哮喘和慢性阻塞性肺病发作期间进行注射比目前的类固醇药片治疗更有效，可将进一步治疗的需要减少 30%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/New-injection-treatment-could-be-a-game-changer-for-people-with-asthma-and-COPD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/New-injection-treatment-could-be-a-game-changer-for-people-with-asthma-and-COPD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97a29f25-47fb-4254-847e-367​​79bbb3e17 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 22:25:57 -0500 New injection treatment could be a game-changer for people with asthma and COPD
强制性卡路里标签提高了人们的认识，但未能减少摄入量英国户外食品行业的强制性卡路里标签并没有显着减少购买或消耗的卡路里，但提高了消费者的意识和标签的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Mandatory-calorie-labels-boost-awareness-but-fail-to-reduce-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Mandatory-calorie-labels-boost-awareness-but-fail-to-reduce-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=733f6ada-4fe8-4731-8ac9-297da043f5fe Wed, 27 Nov 2024 22:25:00 -0500 Mandatory calorie labels boost awareness but fail to reduce intake
战略性参与者选择提高了脑成像研究的可靠性全脑关联研究利用磁共振成像来识别大脑结构或功能与人类行为或健康之间的关系，但因产生的结果往往无法被其他研究人员复制而受到批评。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Strategic-participant-selection-boosts-reliability-in-brain-imaging-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Strategic-participant-selection-boosts-reliability-in-brain-imaging-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7488a04-446d-4a65-b675-89b602f78e0d Wed, 27 Nov 2024 22:21:05 -0500 Strategic participant selection boosts reliability in brain imaging studies
SONIA 试验展示了晚期乳腺癌的经济有效的治疗方法11月27日，著名杂志《自然》将发表荷兰一项创新乳腺癌研究项目的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/SONIA-trial-demonstrates-cost-efficient-treatment-approach-for-advanced-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/SONIA-trial-demonstrates-cost-efficient-treatment-approach-for-advanced-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0553a8c4-4e68-4fcd-8ec6-68af1db6f737 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 22:17:17 -0500 SONIA trial demonstrates cost-effective treatment approach for advanced breast cancer
